div.p: The governor has required all K-12 school in Louisiana to be shut down beginning Monday, March 16 until April 13.
Accordingly, Belle Chasse Academy will be closed during the dates listed.
We are exploring distance learning during the period school is closed.
Please be sure to respond to the posted message on Parent Square if you do not have internet access in your home.
We will inform all stakeholders as soon as more information becomes available.
We appreciate your flexibility and understanding during this unprecedented time as the safety of all stakeholders in our community is our highest priority.
